tailnet       = localhost
tailnet.1_bbb = value
tailnet.2_aaa = value
tailnet.3_merged.a = value
tailnet.3_merged.b = value
tailnet.4_isolated.a = value
tailnet.5_isolated.b = value
----------
localhost {
	bbb value
	aaa value
	merged {
		a value
		b value
	}
	isolated {
		a value
	}
	isolated {
		b value
	}
}
